page.title: 14SOCIAL CONCERNS IN PARR.
page.content: We went out into our area and asked people several questions of Social Concern. 1."Do you think industry is expanding in St.Helens?". Out of 25 people interviewed 4 said it was, 17 said it was not and 4 said they did not know. 2."Do you think industry is a good thing?". 12 said yes, 9 no and 4 didn't know. 3."What are your views on housing provision in this area?". 10 said good 14 said bad and 1 didn't know. 4."Do you think the Government is concerned enough about the average St.Helens family?". 4 said yes 20 said no and 1 didn't know. 5."Do you think England should spend money on Nuclear Defence?". 12 said yes 12 said no and 1 refused to comment.
